item.description: Lelo’s Ora 3 is an oral sex stimulator that doesn’t rely on suction air technology.

item.title: How Social Media Is Fueling Gen Z’s Sex Recession
item.description: For her new book, journalist Carter Sherman interviewed over 100 young people about why they’re not having sex. She says they’re “very horny” but also more isolated, self-conscious, and fearful.

item.title: Le Wand Dive Review: A Waterproof Wand Vibrator
item.description: It’s heavy and loud, but this powerful wand vibrator will send shockwaves through you, even underwater.
